## Description {#details}

A recipe for handling reduction phis.

The start value is the first operand of the recipe and the incoming value from the backedge is the second operand.

Definition at line 2383 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
